metadata.name: Embered Souls | Ero
metadata.description:
Ero, the  spark of ember. The first Embered Soul.

Back story:

The remnants of a lost age, or the beginning of one? Kindle the embers of a soul astray & shape the universe.

In a world of darkness & shapeless souls.. A spark of ember is conjured, scattered into seven, set out to seek souls of no shape. Embered, these very souls will shape the very foundation of the next world.

The names of these souls, are Ero, Mae, Boe, Eyr, Rid, Eoe & Dun. Among them all lingers an unknown entity.

♦ Embered Souls is a collection of 7 unique 1/1s.
♦ Owner of Ero, will be the first of seven Embered Souls, and will help shape the world anew. You will be privately contacted.

_

Funds from this project will help me develop my games & create more worlds!
